info.description:
REST API for Gorax - a powerful workflow automation platform with webhooks, scheduling, and real-time execution monitoring.

## Authentication
All API endpoints (except /health, /ready, and webhook triggers) require authentication.
In development mode, use the X-User-ID header. In production, use Ory Kratos session cookies.

## Multi-tenancy
All authenticated endpoints require a valid X-Tenant-ID header to identify the tenant context.

## Rate Limiting
API requests are rate-limited based on tenant quotas. Check response headers for limit information.

## Error Handling
Errors follow a consistent format with appropriate HTTP status codes and error messages.
info.title: Gorax Workflow Automation API

get.description: Lists all conversations for the current user
Gets a conversation by ID

post.description: Marks a conversation as abandoned
Creates an actual workflow from the generated workflow
Generates a new workflow from a natural language description
Refines an existing workflow based on user feedback

get.description: Returns categorized error data including error types, frequencies, and affected workflows
Returns aggregated analytics data for the tenant including total executions, success rates, and trends
Returns the most frequently executed workflows ordered by execution count
get.summary: Get top workflows by execution count

parameters.description: Maximum number of workflows to return
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Returns time-series data showing execution trends with configurable granularity (hour, day, week, month)
Returns detailed analytics for a specific workflow including execution counts, success rate, and average duration
Returns performance statistics for individual nodes within a workflow including execution time and success rate
Returns paginated audit logs of role and permission changes
Returns paginated workflow executions with support for filtering by status, trigger type, workflow, and date range
get.summary: List workflow executions with advanced filtering

parameters.description: Filter by status (pending, running, completed, failed)
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Filter by trigger type (manual, webhook, schedule)
parameters.name: trigger_type

get.description: Retrieves complete execution details including all step executions, inputs, outputs, and errors
Returns a list of review reports for moderation

parameters.description: Filter by status: pending, reviewed, actioned, dismissed
parameters.name: status

put.description: Resolves a review report with a status and optional notes
Hides a review from public view

get.description: Returns the list of all available template categories with hierarchy

post.description: Creates a new marketplace category

Returns the most popular templates based on total installs and ratings

post.description: Marks a review as helpful by the current user

delete.description: Removes the current user's helpful vote from a review

post.description: Reports a review for inappropriate content or behavior

parameters.name: search

post.description: Publishes a workflow as a reusable template in the marketplace

post.description: Installs a marketplace template as a workflow in the tenant's account
Submits or updates a rating and review for a marketplace template

parameters.description: Rating data (1-5 stars and optional comment)
parameters.name: rating

get.description: Returns the distribution of ratings (1-5 stars) for a template
Retrieves paginated reviews and ratings for a marketplace template

parameters.description: Sort by: recent, helpful, rating_high, rating_low
parameters.name: sort

delete.description: Deletes a review (only allowed for review author or admin)

get.description: Returns templates that are currently trending based on recent installs and views
Returns all available permissions in the system
Returns all roles configured for the tenant

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific role

delete.description: Deletes a custom role (system roles cannot be deleted)

get.description: List human tasks with optional filters
Get a human task by ID

Reject a human task
Submit data for an input task

put.description: Assigns one or more roles to a user

400.description: Invalid request or no roles provided

post.description: Analyzes an execution error and generates fix suggestions

get.description: Returns all suggestions for a specific execution
Returns basic health status of the API
Returns readiness status including database and Redis health checks
Returns a single suggestion by ID

post.description: Marks a suggestion as applied (user accepted the fix)
Marks a suggestion as dismissed (user rejected the fix)

get.description: Returns a paginated list of webhooks for the authenticated tenant

get.description: Returns a paginated list of workflows for the authenticated tenant

post.description: Creates a new workflow with the provided configuration
Clones multiple workflows in a single operation
Deletes multiple workflows in a single operation

Enables multiple workflows in a single operation
Exports multiple workflows as JSON in a single operation
